subject: Standard RFP document for appointment of Independent Engineer for DBFOT projects of NHAI.
text: ATd4 744 <TTHT grffear<ut TM Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (M7 +aett 73v 4aatt 3< TJTHTf TATT4) #4H / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 #T National Highways Authority of India QM. Extn : 2223 2318 2488 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #-5 & 6, Aqzr-10, ERGT; Tf Rvai-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NoNHAL/ CMC/IE/2011 Date 27.7.2011 POLICY MATTER: TECH (83/2011) Sub: Standard_REP_Document _for_Appointment_of_Independent_Engineer_for_DBEQI Projects_of NHAL The following amendment is made in the Standard RFP Document for Appointment of Independent Engineer  for DBFOT Projects of NHAI issued vide Circular on Policy Matter: Tech(81/2011) dated 05.07.2011 with immediate effect: (i) Entries for Sub criteria for Relevant Experience of the firm for the assignment in Clause 5.3 (i) of Data Sheet Section 2 on Page 16 is replaced by Sub criteria for Relevant Experience of the firm for the assignment Year of Establishment of the Firm (In case of JV year of establishment of Lead 2 Member shall be considered) Average Annual Turnover (last 5 years) from consultancy business 2 Nos of- personnel with the firm 2 Experience as Independent Engineer/Construction   Supervision in Number of Highway Projects of length to 40% of project length of similar category 12 for which RFP invited of 2/4/6** laning Or more in last 7 Experience in DPR preparation for Number of Highway Projects (of length 40% of length of similar category for which RFP invited of 2/4/6** laning or more) in last 7 years Experience in Construction Supervision/DPR [Design Review of Major 3 structures having length of more then 500 metre in last 7 years. **2/4/6 lane as applicable for the project for which RFP is invited. For 2-lane projects experience of 4/6 lane also to be considered with a multiplication factor of 1.5: Experience of 4/6 lane shall be considered interchangeably for 4/6 laning projects. Experience of 2 lane will not be considered for 4/6 laning projects. In case of JV the turnover and experience details of Lead and JV partners to be added: Employer's certificate should be submitted substantiating the experience claimed by the firm: contd, . 2 TI It NHAL key equal years * project
